name: Heartstrings
description:
Heartstrings is a game about building a web of hearts by connecting them together to create a resilient network.

Created for Rainbow Game Jam 2020. Theme: "Strength in Numbers."

Credits

Game created by Jamey Stevenson

[Art]

Hearts icon by Skoll
